archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Receive Response for External Party Support for Party Problem
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Receive a response to the request for support in assessing a party problem from an external party.

properties.value: Receive Response for External Party Support for Party Problem receives a response to the request for support in assessing a party problem from an external party. The external party then becomes involved in the assessment process if their response indicates acceptance of the request.
